Title: An Early Frost
Notes: The first made-for-television film to address people with AIDS.

Title: The Equalizer
Notes: Six year old boy with AIDS is protected from harassment from his neighbors by the titular character.

Title: Go Toward the Light
Notes: A young couple face the realities of life with their child who is diagnosed with AIDS. The young couple (Linda Hamilton, Richard Thomas) try to save their young son from the virus.

Title: Midnight Caller
Actor: Richard CoxKay LenzJulia MontgomeryJ. D. Lewis

Title: Degrassi High
Notes: Heterosexual white male teenager, infected by a summer girlfriend.

Title: The Ryan White Story
Notes: 13-year-old haemophiliac who contracted AIDS from factor VIII

Title: EastEnders
Notes: Heterosexual male; former runaway who returned to his family after contracting HIV; died of an AIDS-related illness. He is the world's first soap opera character to contract the disease, and also the first to portray an HIV/AIDS character on a major television show outside North America.

Title: Life Goes On
Notes: white male teenager, infected by girlfriend.

Title: thirtysomething
Notes: gay male, infected by his one of his partners

Title: Something to Live for: The Alison Gertz Story
Notes: female, infected during a one night affair

Title: And the Band Played On
Notes: The shows details the original discovery of AIDS and early problems in dealing with the disease

Title: NYPD Blue
Notes: Appears on episode titled \Holley and the Blowfish\"
